price: 26. Wana ya soló, ezali elembo тропа moto azali na bobangi.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
